title: Robotics

author: Andrej Gams, Department for Automation, Biocybernetics and Robotics, Jožef Stefan Institute

segmentation: And the chairman of the conference are also Professor Doctor Alan, Energy Chan, Doctor Lounge, lap.
So the robotics conference will take place this Friday starting at 9:00 in the morning, and we will be situated in the Orange Room.
So robotics conferences now, first time in a row in the scope of this multi conference and we aim to initiate interdisciplinary collaboration between robotics researchers.
Of course, we're not limited to only robotics researchers, so we invite everybody who has the time and the will to join us at the conference.
The scope of the conference includes humanoid robotics, which is.
At the most, contributions deal with these subjects.
Also, robotic learning is quite a popular subject in robotics community and also we have papers on robotics in rehabilitation and on industrial robotics.
We want the robotics conference to become an important and traditional part of the Multi Conference Information Society.
So as we said, we have papers on different topics altogether.
I would also like to point out that we also have a guest from abroad to give an invited lecture.
So this would be Christopher guide from the University of Edinburgh.
On Robotics, an on use of artificial intelligence and linguistics in robotics and his talk will be at.
11:30 on Friday, so you're all invited.
